product_name: Black Diamond Stone Climbing Gloves - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Get protection without giving up dexterity in the Black Diamond Stone climbing gloves. These flexible leather gloves guard against abrasion whether you're climbing or belaying. Soft goat leather provides a comfortable, flexible fit. Reinforced leather palms and knuckle patches add extra protection; Kevlar stitching enhances durability. 3/4-length fingers; adjustable rip-and-stick cuffs with pull-on/clip-in loops. Closeout.
short_description: Get protection without giving up dexterity in the Black Diamond Stone climbing gloves. These flexible leather gloves guard against abrasion whether you're climbing or belaying.
